headline: Wabtec Declares Regular Quarterly Common Dividend
summary: PITTSBURGH, October 16, 2025--Wabtec Corporation (NYSE: WAB) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly common dividend of 25 cents per share, payable on November 26, 2025, to holders of record on November 12, 2025.
